mapper.insert: insert into tbl_qna(qna_no, userid, qna_title, qna_content, qna_state) values (seq_tbl_qna_no.nextval, #{userid}, #{qna_title}, #{qna_content}, #{qna_state})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from(select q.qna_no, q.userid, q.qna_title, q.qna_content, q.qna_state, q.qna_regdate, c.qna_no answer_no from tbl_qna q, tbl_qna_comment c where q.qna_no = c.qna_no(+) order by q.qna_no desc) a) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select q.qna_no, q.qna_title, q.qna_content, q.qna_state, q.qna_regdate, c.qna_no answer_no from tbl_qna q, tbl_qna_comment c where q.qna_no = c.qna_no(+) and q.qna_no = #{qna_no}
